issue.title: Implement reactions API?

repository.name: jcabi-github
repository.description: Java Object-Oriented Wrapper of GitHub API, with a fake implementation of the entire GitHub API (for your tests)

issue.body:
Github recently introduced Reactions API. We could start implementing it.

https://developer.github.com/v3/reactions/#list-reactions-for-a-commit-comment

body: @amihaiemil[/z](https://www.0crat.com/u/amihaiemil) please, pay attention to this issue

Job [#1451](https://github.com/jcabi/jcabi-github/issues/1451) is now in scope, role is `DEV`

issue.title: For #1451: Reactions implementation

repository.name: jcabi-github
repository.description: Java Object-Oriented Wrapper of GitHub API, with a fake implementation of the entire GitHub API (for your tests)

issue.body:
For #1451:
- Implemented test for reaction support by ´RtComent`
- Added puzzles for adding reaction support to `Issue`, complete reaction support in `Comment` and add reaction suport to other elements as github API specifies

body: The puzzle `1230-92aa948b` has disappeared from the source code, that's why I closed this issue. //cc @amihaiemil
